front.title: RADIUS Support for Proxy Mobile IPv6

abstract.t: This document defines new attributes to facilitate Proxy Mobile IPv6operations using RADIUS infrastructure. The RADIUS interactions takeplace when the Mobile Node attaches, authenticates and authorizes toa Proxy Mobile IPv6 domain. Furthermore, this document also definesa RADIUS based interface between the Local Mobility Anchor and theRADIUS server for authorizing received initial Proxy Binding Updatemessages for the mobility service session. In addition to themobility session setup related RADIUS interaction, this documentdefines the baseline for both the Mobile Access Gateway and the LocalMobility Anchor generated accounting.
